com.polytech.goldfish.businesslogic.factory

Class PersonFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.polytech.goldfish.businesslogic.factory.PersonFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PersonFactoryJDBC

    public abstract class PersonFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory class This class provides the methods necessary to create the Persons used in the application
    Author:
    Gaëtan FRANÇOIS

        public abstract java.lang.Integer createPerson(java.lang.Object typePerson,
                                               java.lang.String surname,

                                               java.lang.String street,
                                               java.lang.Integer street_number,
                                               java.lang.Integer zip_code,
                                               java.lang.String city,
                                               java.lang.String shopname,
                                               java.lang.String description,
                                               java.lang.Integer siret,
                                               java.lang.String activitydomain,
                                               java.lang.String webaddress)
                                        throws GoldfishException
        This method creates a new Person
        Parameters:
        typePerson - the Person's type
        surname - the Person's surname
        name - the Person's name
        phone_number - the Person's phone number
        email - the Person's email
        password - the Person's password
        street - the Person's address' street
        street_number - the Person's address' street number
        zip_code - the Person's address' zip code
        city - the Person's address' city
        shopname - the Person's shopname
        description - the Person's description
        siret - the Person's SIRET
        activitydomain - the Person's activitydomain
        webaddress - the Person's webaddress
        Returns:
        the Person's id
        Throws:
        GoldfishException
